detaileddescription.para: Check that all the tensors are rank three, and that the size of the bond dimension of neighbouring tensors matches.
explicit conversion to a bMPT. discards the position of the orthogonality center and lift the bMPS constraints. Be careful, this function does not create a copy of the underlying tensors.
move the orthogonality center to the position i on the chain.

briefdescription.para: Class for the matrix product state. A tensor train of rank three tensors, with an orthogonality center.

detaileddescription.para: Class for the matrix product state. A tensor train of rank three tensors, with an orthogonality center.
